verses.text: Lord, dismiss us with thy blessing, Fill our hearts with joy and peace; Let us each, thy love possessing, Triumph in redeeming grace.
Thanks we give and adoration For thy gospel's joyful sound; May the fruits of thy salvation In our hearts and lives abound.
So that when thy love shall call us, Savior, from the world away, Fear of death shall not appall us, Glad thy summons to obey.
Ever faithful, ever faithful To the truth may we be found; So may we through life be faithful, Till with glory we are crowned.
